_comment: This configuration uses meta_only mode for maximum efficiency
_benefits: Only 3 meta-tools registered initially (vs. 67 in eager mode)
Claude will use unifi_tool_index to discover tools on-demand
Faster initial responses due to smaller context
_how_it_works: Claude starts with only: unifi_tool_index, unifi_async_start, unifi_async_status
When user asks about UniFi, Claude calls unifi_tool_index
Tool index returns all 64+ tools with schemas
Claude then calls the specific tool needed
Result: Only relevant tools consume context
_example_prompts: What can you do with my UniFi network?
Show me my top 10 wireless clients by bandwidth
Start a background job to reboot my access points
